channel.title: (317)delta based -is it possible to add QuickChat by clicking on the skill?-
channel.description: i was wondering if it possible to add quick chat by clicking on the skill interface and it quickchats what that skill level is? could i get some help on this?

item.title: (317)delta based -is it possible to add QuickChat by clicking on the skill?-
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.source: (317)delta based -is it possible to add QuickChat by clicking on the skill?-

item.title: (317)delta based -is it possible to add QuickChat by clicking on the skill?-
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Put this in clickingMost, I took it from PI and converted it.

case 33206: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Attack level is " + c.playerLevel[0] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33209: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Strength level is " + c.playerLevel[2] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33212: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Defence level is " + c.playerLevel[1] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33215: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Range level is " + c.playerLevel[4] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33218: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Prayer level is " + c.playerLevel[5] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33221: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Magic level is " + c.playerLevel[6] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33224: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Runecrafting level is " + c.playerLevel[20] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33207: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Hitpoints level is " + c.playerLevel[3] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33210: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Agility level is " + c.playerLevel[16] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33213: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Herblore level is " + c.playerLevel[15] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33216: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Thieving level is " + c.playerLevel[17] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33219: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Crafting level is " + c.playerLevel[12] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33222: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Fletching level is " + c.playerLevel[9] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33208: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Mining level is " + c.playerLevel[14] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33211: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Smithing level is " + c.playerLevel[13] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33214: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Fishing level is " + c.playerLevel[10] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33217: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Cooking level is " + c.playerLevel[7] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33220: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Firemaking level is " + c.playerLevel[11] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33223: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Woodcutting level is " + c.playerLevel[8] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 33226: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Farming level is " + c.playerLevel[19] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break; case 47130: c.plrText = "[Quick Chat] My Slayer level is " + c.playerLevel[18] + ""; c.plrTextUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break;
